a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Biofuel production is measured in terawatt-hours (TWh) per year, and includes both bioethanol and biodiesel.
Note: CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States) is an organization of ten post-Soviet republics in
Eurasia following break-up of the Soviet Union.
Data source: Statistical Review of World Energy - BP (2022)
